column4: "Soma mbanyin ma wɔnkɛsera Keenan asaase a medze rema Israelmba no: hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw biara mu no hom nsoma mu banyin kor
column5: na hɔn nyina nyɛ hɔn mu mbapɔmba no bi."

column2: "Na Moses somaa hɔn fi Paran sar do dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse: hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ mbanyin a wɔyɛ Israelmba mu etsitsir."
"Na hɔn edzin nye yi: Reuben ebusuakuw dze
"Iyinom nye mbanyin a Moses somaa hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛsera asaase no hɔn edzin. Na Moses frɛɛ Nun ne babanyin Hosea no dɛ Josua."
"Na Moses somaa hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛsera Keenan asaase no
column4: Hom mfa pomu afamu ɔkwan yi do

column3: mbrɛ ɔtse; nye ɔman a wɔtse do no
column4: kyerɛ dɛ wɔyɛ dzen anaa wɔyɛ mberɛw

column2: "nye mbrɛ asaase a wɔtse do no tse
column3: dɛ oye anaa omuo; na mbrɛ nkurow a wɔtsetse mu no tsetsee

column4: dɛ ndua wɔ do anaa ɔnntse dɛm. Na hom nnya akokodur
column5: na wɔmfa asaase no do aba bi mbra. Nna aber no yɛ esikyireamba ababer a odzi kan n'aber."

column3: na wɔkɛseraa asaase no fi Zin sar do kodur Rehob
column4: wɔ mbrɛ wɔnam kɔ Hamat no."

column3: na wodur Hebron; na hɔ na Anakmba no
column7: wɔwɔ. (Na Hebron yi wɔkyekyeer no mfe esuon ansaana wɔrekyekyer Zoan a ɔwɔ Egypt.)"

column3: na wotwaa abaw a esikyireamba siaw kor wɔ do wɔ hɔ
column4: na beenu wuraa no dua soae; na wɔdze pɔmegranate eduaba

column2: "Wɔfrɛɛ bea no Eskol ɔbɔn no mu
column3: osian siaw no a Israelmba twaa no wɔ hɔ no ntsi."
wɔsanee fii asaase no ne nserae mu bae."

column4: nye Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara nkyɛn
column6: wɔ Kades; na wɔbɔɔ hɔn amandzɛɛ kyerɛɛ hɔn
column8: na wɔdze asaase no do aba no kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column4: Yɛkɔr asaase a esomaa hɛn do no do
column5: na numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do ampa; na no do aba nye yi."

column2: "Naaso ɔman a wɔtse asaase no do no na wɔyɛ dzen
column3: na nkurow no wɔabɔ ho ban
column4: ɔsoso dodow: na nkyii so yehun Anakmba wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Amalek tse Pomu afamu asaase no do: na Hitifo
column5: tsetse mbepɔw no do: na Keenanfo tse po no ho

column2: "Na Kaleb dwedwee ɔman no wɔ Moses enyim
column6: na yebotum edzi hɔn do nyim."

column2: "Na mbanyin a wɔnye no kɔree no dze see dɛ
column3: Yerunntum nnkɔfow nnkɔ nnkɛhyɛ ɔman no do; osiandɛ wɔyɛ dzen sen hɛn."

column2: "Na wɔdze asaase a wɔkɛserae no ho atsenka bɔn brɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ
column3: Asaase a yɛakɛfa mu akɛsera no
column4: ɔyɛ asaase a odzi no do atsefo no; na nkorɔfo a yehun hɔn wɔ do no nyinara wɔyɛ nyimpa a wɔyɛ akraban."

column2: "Na hɔ na yehun abran akɛse no
column3: Anak ne mbabanyin no a wofi Nefilfo mu no: na yɛyɛɛ dɛ mbɛbɛw wɔ hɛnankasa hɛn enyi do
column4: na dɛmara na yɛyɛe wɔ hɔn enyi do."
